医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Sphere Fluidics 任命 Curtis Nicholson 为 EMEA 销售总监，以支持关键市场的加速增长Sphere Fluidics 是一家基于微流体技术的创新单细胞分析和分离解决方案的领先供应商，今天宣布任命 Curtis Nicholson 为欧洲、中东和非洲 (EMEA) 销售总监。柯蒂斯的任命将加强公司在这些地区的市场地位，因为公司正在推进雄心勃勃的未来增长和商业成功计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Sphere-Fluidics-appoints-Curtis-Nicholson-as-Director-of-Sales-EMEA-to-support-accelerated-growth-in-key-markets。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Sphere-Fluidics-appoints-Curtis-Nicholson-as-Director-of-Sales-EMEA-to-support-accelerated-growth-in-key-markets。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f159ec26-8912-4879-a636-c2663b68e066 Thu, 23 May 2024 08:02:00 -0400 Sphere Fluidics appoints Curtis Nicholson as Director of Sales, EMEA, to support accelerated growth in key markets
Refeyn 通过位于波士顿地区的新美国总部加强了能力作为质量光度测定技术的先驱，Refeyn 正在继续加强其独特生物分析工具的部署，计划在 2024 年第三届年度质量光度测定峰会上隆重开设新的美国总部和客户互动中心。 Refeyn 将于 5 月 22 日在波士顿地区举行，重点介绍质量光度测定的最新进展，并于 5 月 23 日在马萨诸塞州大波士顿沃尔瑟姆生物技术中心的中心正式开放其占地 10,000 平方英尺的新总部。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Refeyn-strengthens-capability-with-new-US-Headquarters-in-Boston-area.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Refeyn-strengthens-capability-with-new-US-Headquarters-in-Boston-area.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17973828-6db4-4b55-89c2-de02bf6764e3 Thu, 23 May 2024 07:58:00 -0400 Refeyn strengthens capability with new US Headquarters in Boston area
红外显微镜如何解决经典的组织病理学问题在这次采访中，News-Medical.net 采访了鲁尔大学的 Klaus Gerwert 教授，讨论了如何使用红外显微镜解决组织病理学问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/How-Infrared-Microscopy-Can-Solve-Classic-Histopathology-Problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/How-Infrared-Microscopy-Can-Solve-Classic-Histopathology-Problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7bebd81-4b84-441b-866c-dbc8b798d04b Thu, 23 May 2024 07:51:00 -0400
洛杉矶县推出了雄心勃勃的计划来解决医疗债务问题。医院发出呻吟声。洛杉矶县发起了全国最雄心勃勃的解决医疗债务问题的行动之一，目标是医院在解决 29 亿美元的问题中发挥的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Los-Angeles-County-launches-ambitious-plan-to-tackle-medical-debt-Hospitals-groan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Los-Angeles-County-launches-ambitious-plan-to-tackle-medical-debt-Hospitals-groan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c615277-a171-48a2-b73e-2a945bcda444 Thu, 23 May 2024 07:19:16 -0400 Los Angeles County launches ambitious plan to tackle medical debt. Hospitals groan.
德克萨斯州狭长地带奶牛场禽流感归零地的线索二月初，德克萨斯州狭长地带的奶农开始注意到牛生病了。德克萨斯州奶制品协会执行董事达伦·特利（Darren Turley）很快就听到了议论：“他们说有一些东西正在从牛群转移到牛群。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Clues-from-bird-flue28099s-ground-zero-on-dairy-farms-in-the-Texas-Panhandle.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Clues-from-bird-flue28099s-ground-zero-on-dairy-farms-in-the-Texas-Panhandle.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac70062e-b6cc-4436-baf6-9c2c882dfca3 Thu, 23 May 2024 07:15:31 -0400 Clues from bird flu’s ground zero on dairy farms in the Texas Panhandle
睡眠不足对肥胖青少年的影响更大吗？与健康体重的同龄人相比，睡眠不足对肥胖青少年认知功能的影响更大。该研究强调了睡眠对认知健康的重要性，尤其是对于超重的青少年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Does-poor-sleep-hit-obese-teens-harder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Does-poor-sleep-hit-obese-teens-harder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=740258df-2cfb-48e5-9347-1417ea22481a Thu, 23 May 2024 00:16:00 -0400 Does poor sleep hit obese teens harder?
在促进健康方面，步数计数与基于时间的锻炼一样有效吗？通过步数或锻炼时间来监测身体活动，在减少 60 多岁女性的心血管疾病和全因死亡率方面显示出类似的益处。两种方法都支持健康指南和个人偏好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Are-step-counts-as- effective-as-time-based-exercise-in-boosting-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Are-step-counts-as- effective-as-time-based-exercise-in-boosting-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9936ccb4-4b59-4f45-854e-8ff891bd7922 Thu, 23 May 2024 00:03:00 -0400 Are step counts as effective as time-based exercise in boosting health?
研究人员发现预测 1 型糖尿病患者肾衰竭的进展在《科学转化医学》今天发表的一篇论文中，来自希望之城（美国最大的癌症研究和治疗组织之一、糖尿病和其他危及生命疾病的领先研究中心）的研究人员报告说，他们在以下方面发现了进展：预测 1 型糖尿病 (T1D) 患者的肾衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Researchers-discover-advances-in-predicting-kidney-failure-in-type-1-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Researchers-discover-advances-in-predicting-kidney-failure-in-type-1-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03905dc6-ef40-49e7-a087-ad0a865652ad Wed, 22 May 2024 23:57:00 -0400 Researchers discover advances in predicting kidney failure in type 1 diabetes patients
超加工食品摄入量增加与中风和认知能力下降的风险增加有关2024 年 5 月 22 日发表的一项新研究显示，与少吃加工食品的人相比，多吃软饮料、薯片和饼干等超加工食品的人出现记忆和思维问题以及中风的风险更高，美国神经病学学会医学杂志《Neurology》在线期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Higher-intake-of-ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-increased-risk-of-中风-and-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Higher-intake-of-ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-increased-risk-of-中风-and-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8be459c7-e3b4-42cd-b06c-881f1ef8c592 Wed, 22 May 2024 23:54:00 -0400 Higher intake of ultra-processed foods linked to increased risk of stroke and cognitive decline
地点、种族和保险状况在早期与晚期癌症诊断中发挥着关键作用约翰霍普金斯大学彭博学院的研究人员对超过 94,000 名癌症患者进行了详细的医疗记录分析，地点、种族和保险状况在患者被诊断为早期或晚期癌症的几率中起着重要作用。公共卫生部和约翰霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Location-race-and-insurance-status-play-key-role-in-early-stage-versus-late-stage-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240522/Location-race-and-insurance-status-play-key-role-in-early-stage-versus-late-stage-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=876d82d0-351b-4669-adeb-4efe5c732092 Wed, 22 May 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Location, race and insurance status play key role in early-stage versus late-stage cancer diagnosis
